strapiPost.title: Crystal Bridges and The Momentary Commit to Being Inclusive Institutions
strapiPost.content:
In wake of the Jan. 6 events at our nation's Capitol, Crystal Bridges and The Momentary said in a statement that these events were a chilling reminder of the significant work ahead, and are committed to becoming actively open and welcoming to all.

  • In effort to carry out the work of promoting equality, Crystal Bridges and The Momentary are launching In Real Time, a series of programs that include lectures, community conversations, and educational resources that raise social consciousness and empower change. -Crystal Bridges
  • More information will become available when the program's dates are announced, but they encourage others to check out their current resources:
